document.masterDocTitle: Acrotritia species (Acari: Oribatida: Euphthiracaridae) from China with description of a new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Acrotritia species (Acari: Oribatida: Euphthiracaridae) from China with description of a new species

subSubSection.paragraph:
Measurements. Prodorsum: length 255–280 , width 170–200 , height 105–115 , setae: ss 55–100 , ro 50–55 , in 115–130 , le 70–75 , ex 14–15 , mutual distance: in–in 105 , le–le 55 , ro–ro 45 ; notogaster: length 510–590 , width 330–395 , height 360–420 ; setae: c 1 67.5–75 , c 2 50–65 , c 3 55–60 , c p 50–75 , d 1 55–60 , d 2 45–50 ,
e 1 64
–65,
e 2 64
–65, h 1 75–80 , h 2 50–60 , h 3 45–60 , ps 1 75–80 , ps 2 55–60 , ps 3 55–65 , mutual distance: c 1 – d 1 135–140 , d 1 – e 1 150–182.5 , e 1 – h 1 130–135 , h 1 – ps 1 100–120 ; genito-aggenital plate 175 × 85 , ano-adanal plate 245 × 60 .

Colour yellowish to brown; prodorsum with one pair of long and strong lateral carinae; sensilla with swollen head covered with small spines; prodorsal setae robust, rigid and densely barbed in distal half, except exobothridial setae; notogastral setae fairly short, similar in shape to lamellar setae; vestigial setae f 1 situated anterior to setae h 1 ; 9 pairs of minute genital setae present, including 1 pair of setae inserted on progenital area; 2 pairs of aggenital setae located longitudinally; tarsi of legs I bidactylous, tarsi II–IV heterotridactylous.
